raw_body: DIAS,​ DOROTHY – Beloved wife of the late Bede,​ cherished mother of Rohan (USA),​ Nirmal,​ Srilal (Australia) and remembered in loving memory of the late Thilak,​ Ivan and Luckie (UK). She was mother-in-law to Illika,​ Sandamali,​ Marina,​ Renuka and Prasanna,​ Dorothy was a loving sister to Edna Devagiri and Ranjaini Abeysena. She peacefully departed from us on the 3rd of September 2023. Her remains will be placed for viewing at 681,​ Aluthmawatha Road,​ Mutwal,​ Colombo 15,​ on the 8th of September from midday. Cortege leaves at 3 p.m. on the 9th for burial at Madampitiya Cemetery after the service at St. James Church,​ Mutwal.056673
